titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Records of the Drug Policy Office of XXX, 1990-1994
titlestmt.subtitle: Records of the Drug Policy Office of XXX 35386, 35669
titlestmt.author: LVA Staff

publicationstmt.date: © 2020 By The Library of Virginia. All Rights Reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid created in EAD by LVA Staff, 17 July 2020

titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Records of the Drug Policy Office of XXX, 1990-1994
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 35386, 35669

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the Drug Policy Office of XXX, 1990-1994

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Records of the Drug Policy Office of XXX

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred by Governor xxx on 13 June 1997 (Accession 35386) and 14 January 1998 (Accession 35669).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1990-1994, of the Drug Policy Office.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series: Series I: Correspondence and Subject Files and Series II: Grant Files.

did.unittitle: Series I: Correspondence and Subject Files, 1990-1994.

scopecontent.p: The Correspondence and Subject Files series is housed in 21 boxes and is arranged into two (2) subseries. Subseries have been designated for: A. Correspondence and B. Subject Files. The series consists of budgets, clippings, correspondence, memorandum, publications, and reports.
This subseries is housed in 6 boxes. Includes correspondence, budgets, clippings, memorandum, and reports.

This subseries is housed in 15 boxes and is arranged alphabetically by folder title. Includes articles, brochures, conference programs, correspondence, memorandum, minutes, publications, reports, and videos.
